identified-content.object.title: One Lonely Sea Horse (Book)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: One Lonely Sea Horse, children's book by Joost Elffers and Saxton Freymann in which characters are made of food, noted; photo (Food Stuff column)

block.p: ''One Lonely Sea Horse'' (Arthur A. Levine/Scholastic, $15.95) offers proof that there are apparently no limits to the imagination of Joost Elffers and Saxton Freymann, authors of ''Play With Your Food,'' who wrote this children's book in which the characters are made of food. It tells the story of Bea, a sea horse made of beets, and her friends: banana squid and dolphins, eggplant sharks, ginger crustaceans and bright bell-pepper tropical fish, which swim amid coral reefs made of hen-of-the-woods mushrooms.

''One Lonely Sea Horse'' (Arthur A. It tells the story of Bea, a sea horse made of beets, and her friends: banana squid and dolphins, eggplant sharks, ginger crustaceans and bright bell-pepper tropical fish, which swim amid coral reefs made of hen-of-the-woods mushrooms.
FOOD STUFF The Food Stuff column now appears every other week, alternating with the Eating Well column.
